contentList.content: <font color='#FF0000'>You already know how to speak to animals!</font>
[GLOBAL] Make the Pet Pal Talent Book only grant the Pet Pal tag. (Default)
Enable One-Button Party Sneaking - If you sneak, all chained characters you own will sneak as well (outside of combat). Manually disable sneak, and your characters will stop sneaking too.

Read to study ancient techniques used to speak with animals.
Can only be learned once!
Grants the Pet Pal talent or tag, depending on your Bartering Tweaks settings..
[GLOBAL] Make the Pet Pal Talent Book grant the Pet Pal talent instead.

[GLOBAL] Prevent all Bartering Tweaks books from spawning on non-LeaderLib traders.
Warning: If you enable this and lose your book, you're on your own! (Books Currently Enabled)

Read to study ancient techniques used to speak with animals.
Can only be learned once!
Grants the Pet Pal tag.
*Note: Some settings are only available to the host user.*
Through knowledge gained from a book, you're now able to speak to animals.
Enable Attitude Sharing - When attitude is increased, the party is brought up to the same amount.
Enable Bonus Status Text. When bonuses are applied/removed, you'll see corresponding status texts displayed above all associated characters.
[GLOBAL] Allow all Bartering Tweaks books to spawn on non-LeaderLib traders. (Books Current Disabled)
Use to open the Bartering Tweaks settings menu.
<font color='#FF0000'>You can't open the settings menu while in combat!</font>
Disable One-Button Party Sneaking for User-Owned Characters
Disable Bonus Status Text. When bonuses are applied/removed, you'll no longer see corresponding status texts displayed above all associated characters.

Shares the highest barter and persuasion bonuses among the party while trading. Additionally, BT contains additional quality-of-life tweaks, such as auto-sneaking chained party members when sneaking/unsneaking. If LeaderLib is active, the Bartering Tweaks settings menu is available from the mod menu, otherwise a settings book will be added to the party's inventory.
